APP_DESCRIPTION: Retrobox is a virtual suggestion box. Create a box for you or your team to put items into, then at your next retrospective you can drop the items out to review them.
INDEX_PAGE_SUBTEXT: Start making retrospectives easier. Use Retrobox to jot down and keep track of items and actions!
HOME_PAGE_HEADING: Select a page from the left
HOME_PAGE_SUBTEXT: There will be more here to see eventually
BOX_PAGE_NOT_FOUND_SUBTITLE: Return to the box list and try again
CREATE_BOX_FORM_HELP_TEXT: Pick a name that suits your project or activity
SIGN_IN_FORM_EMAIL_REQUIRED_ERROR: You must provide an email address
SIGN_IN_FORM_HELP_TEXT: A magic link will be sent to this address
